title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default) (see perspectives).

NOTES:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

Released fixes for a, c, f, g.
OB: The File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected, while other pages do not exhibit the same behavior.
EB: The File editors Pref page should not grow in height when it is selected, similar to other pages.
SR:
To reproduce:

MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

1. Go to the preference page and select Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors', go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to Internal, there should still be no selection.
4. Press OK. This adds the selected external editor.
